name: E.L.O.T.E
description:
This is a demo of an idea I had about a kernel of corn's journey through the human body. I didn't get to implement everything I want to but I happy with what I was able to do.  The platforms are suppose to represent the tongue so the faster and continuously you move the platforms become slipper.  

move left and right with arrows 

jump with space bar, double jump by pressing the space bar while in the air

shoot by pressing 'a'

press esc key to end game while game is playing.
